originalText.text:
I have lived at Avalon Morningside Park for years now and am always grateful for the wonderful service we receive. Each staff member I encounter, whether theyâ€™re from the front desk, maintenance, or the office, is friendly and goes out of their way to ensure that I have what I need. While issues in the building are rare, I know that if one ever arises, the necessary team will work quickly and diligently to address my concernâ€”I have seen this with maintenance requests and through my conversations with the community manager. I truly cannot sing enough praises about the entire staff hereâ€”I really appreciate them and their hard work so much.

I am always greeted with a warm smile from the front desk when I leave in the mornings and when I arrive at the end of a long day. The common areas are kept neat and tidy and are always warm and welcoming. I have lived in a few other large buildings in NYC, and have to say that Avalon Morningside has been, without a doubt, the best experience I have had since moving to the city. I couldnâ€™t ask for a better place to call home, and look forward to many more years here.

originalText.text: Looking for an apartment in NYC isnâ€™t for the faint of heart but my experience touring here has definitely put me at ease. I had a pleasure of meeting the community manager Camden Yorke at the Avalon communities. He is a true ambassador of the community. He explained the application process and was transparent about everything. I left the tour ensured I had access to the entire range of options so that I could make the best choice for my next steps

originalText.text: Our experience at Avalon Morningside was good. Parking was a bit difficult at first but things got better. When we moved in found few maintenance issue, had to call maintenance, they address issues super fast. the day we moved- out met a aggressive folk in leasing office, turns out a building contractor, Avalon management did reach out to us later to apologize for that incident. We do appreciate that much. Gustavo, Camden, Michael are super nice ...the apartment common areas are well maintained and safety always are their top priority which we loved the most. We moved to our new place but carrying fond memories of our time at Avalon Morningside Park.

originalText.text: Recently, I had a pleasure to meet community manager Camden York, who introduced me to the Avalon communities. I must say that I was pleasantly surprised with Mr. York's kind personality and what Avalon has to offer to their residents. Therefore I am happy to say that I am considering moving in anytime soon.

I must say that I was pleasantly surprised with Mr. York's kind personality and what Avalon has to offer to their residents. Therefore I am happy to say that I am considering moving in anytime soon.

originalText.text:
Avalon Morningside Park staff truly deserve accolades for their exceptional service and dedication. I have been residing here for over three years; and my encounters with each staff member have exceeded my expectations.

The staff members are incredibly knowledgeable and competent in their roles. Their knowledge, professionalism and friendliness, effective communication, and genuine care for residents make them an invaluable asset to this building community. The moment you step foot into the building, the concierge team, especially Deno, Gustavo, Patrick, etc. will warmly welcome you! They go out of their way to ensure that residents felt valued and appreciated â€“ they'll even open for you the elevator... Manager Camden, and Michael the Community Consultant will welcome you in the office with a warm smile and provide an effective solution to any issues you might have. As you live your life, the dedicated maintenance staff keep the building spotlessly clean, safe, and well-maintained as evident in all corners that I explored.

Therefore, I always look forward to returning home (aptðŸ˜Š)! I highly recommend Avalon Morningside Park to anyone seeking a remarkable living experience with a standout building staff!
